mapper.select: SELECT A.BRAND_ID , A.CORP_ID , A.BRAND_NAME , A.BRAND_DESC , A.BRAND_KEY , A.CATEGORY_ID , A.SUB_CATEGORY_ID , A.BRAND_INFO , A.REG_DT , A.REQ_DT , B.APPROVAL_DT FROM CM_RCS_BRAND_REQ A INNER JOIN CM_RCS_BRAND B ON A.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT ${rowsFront}, #{rowsEnd}
